name: The Journeyman Project 2: Buried in Time

write_file.content:
[sblaster]
irq=5
[sdl]
sensitivity=20
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom
SET PATH=%PATH%;C:\WINDOWS;C:\runexit
SET TEMP=C:\WINDOWS\TEMP
C:
win D:\bitsetup.exe
exit

[sblaster]
irq=5
[sdl]
sensitivity=20
[autoexec]
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom
SET PATH=%PATH%;C:\WINDOWS;C:\runexit
SET TEMP=C:\WINDOWS\TEMP
C:
win
exit

files.game: N/A:Select the Autoexec.bat from a Win3.1 install

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select the Autoexec.bat from a Win3.1 install
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/journeyman.conf
installer:
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      src_path=$(echo "$1" | sed -r "s/(.+)\/.+/\1/")

      cp -avr "$src_path/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- write_file:
    content: '#!/bin/bash

      src=$1

      dst=$2

      cp -avr "$src/."  "$dst"'
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- chmodx: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/CDD $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1
    file: mkdir
- execute:
    args: $game $GAMEDIR/HDD
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 1
    requires: bitdata
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 2
    requires: bitdata
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- insert-disc:
    description: Please insert disc 3
    requires: bitdata
- execute:
    args: $DISC $GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1
    file: $CACHE/bulkcopy-alt.sh
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/HDD/runexit
    file: $runexit
    format: zip
- execute:
    args: -R 775  "$GAMEDIR/CDD"
    file: /bin/chmod
- write_file:
    content: '[sblaster]

      irq=5

      [sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom

      SET PATH=%PATH%;C:\WINDOWS;C:\runexit

      SET TEMP=C:\WINDOWS\TEMP

      C:

      win D:\bitsetup.exe

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/journeyman-setup.conf
- task:
    config_file: $GAMEDIR/journeyman-setup.conf
    name: dosexec
    working_dir: $GAMEDIR/HDD
- write_file:
    content: '[sblaster]

      irq=5

      [sdl]

      sensitivity=20

      [autoexec]

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      mount D "$GAMEDIR/CDD/DISC1" -t cdrom

      SET PATH=%PATH%;C:\WINDOWS;C:\runexit

      SET TEMP=C:\WINDOWS\TEMP

      C:

      win

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/journeyman.conf
